sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: Grab the next board ID, drop it from the main list

sys_hub_input_scripts.script: {"next_board_id":{"scriptActive":true,"script":"var boardIds \u003d fd_data.flow_var.board_ids.split(\u0027,\u0027);\n// Get the next board ID from the first ID in our flow variable\nreturn boardIds[0];"}}
{"board_ids":{"scriptActive":true,"script":"var oldBoardIds \u003d fd_data.flow_var.board_ids.split(\u0027,\u0027);\n// Drop the first board ID in the list\nreturn oldBoardIds.slice(1).join();"}}
